body_html: Oh, BTW, flipping through some code today, it occurred to me that we should probably #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN 1 before including windows.h headers. I usually don't like to have them in header files, only in cpp files, because there a ton of symbols in there.
body_text: Oh, BTW, flipping through some code today, it occurred to me that we should probably #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN 1 before including windows.h headers. I usually don't like to have them in header files, only in cpp files, because there a ton of symbols in there.
body: Oh, BTW, flipping through some code today, it occurred to me that we should probably `#define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN 1` before including windows.h headers. I usually don't like to have them in header files, only in cpp files, because there a ton of symbols in there.
